channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: "This is existential": MAGA's siege mentality deepens after Kirk killing
item.description: Charlie Kirk's assassination has unleashed an outpouring of rage across the MAGA universe, with many leaders framing his death as evidence the movemen...

item.title: Senate mounts new Russia pressure campaign
item.description: A bipartisan group of senators are pushing to label Russia a state sponsor of terrorism over kidnapped Ukrainian children, as momentum builds once aga...

item.title: State Department warns immigrants not to mock Kirk's death
item.description: The State Department on Thursday indicated it would review the legal status of immigrants "praising, rationalizing, or making light" of conservative a...

item.title: "I'm f***ing sick of it": Charlie Kirk shooting sends Congress' civility crisis into overdrive
item.description: The shooting of conservative activist Charlie Kirk threatens to bring the already hostile relationship between Democrats and Republicans in Congress t...

item.title: Police release photo of person of interest in Charlie Kirk shooting death
item.description: Investigators in Utah released photos of a "person of interest" they're seeking in the fatal shooting of conservative activist Charlie Kirk. Driving t...

item.title: Nadine Menendez, wife of ex-senator, sentenced to 4½ years
item.description: She was convicted in April for her part in a bribery scandal that led to her husband, former U.S. senator Bob Menendez, being sentenced to prison for ...

item.title: To Vance, Charlie Kirk was not just a political ally. He was a friend.
item.description: The vice president and the conservative activist, who was killed Wednesday, had a friendship that went back almost a decade.

item.title: Republicans name members to new Jan. 6 committee
item.description: Democrats and Republicans will participate in a GOP-led reinvestigation of the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.

item.title: What a Virginia Democrat’s decisive win may mean for midterm elections
item.description: Democrat James Walkinshaw handily won a recent special election in Virginia’s 11th Congressional District with a message focused on job loss from Trum...

item.title: Republicans invoke ‘nuclear option’ in push to change Senate rules
item.description: The rules change will allow the Senate to confirm multiple nominees at once, helping to clear a backlog of nearly 150 nominees awaiting floor votes.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
